input.sentences: a local news reporter takes a picture of a group of girls who finished graduating college with my sister .
after taking the picture the news reporter joined me as well as fellow reporters in the conference room .
after meeting with fellow reporters i captured my sister gleefully running around the grounds with her diploma in hand .
to end the graduation ceremony the college orchestra performed their rendition of a classic .
after the concert i got a picture of my sister holding two sets of flowers my mother and i gave her for graduating .
output.sentences: all of our families are here to help celebrate.
this is one of my proudest achievements.
we had a party at home to celebrate with friends and family.
